meeting_info.organization: Government Performance and Financial Management Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Briefing Room, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of the August 26, 2024 Government Performance and Financial Management Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Monthly Update on Repairs to Family Gateway Property Damage
agenda_items.description: Update on the repairs to the Family Gateway property.

agenda_items.title: Review of City Real Estate for Development and Redevelopment
agenda_items.description: Proposed new property management strategies and process improvements for various properties.

agenda_items.title: FY24 Year End Appropriation Adjustments
agenda_items.description: Adjustments to the budget for the fiscal year 2024.

agenda_items.title: Office of the City Auditor Fiscal Year 2025 Recommended Annual Audit Work Plan
agenda_items.description: Presentation of the recommended audit work plan for FY2025.

agenda_items.title: Inspector General Division - Quarterly Report - 3rd Quarter FY 2024
agenda_items.description: Quarterly report from the Inspector General Division.

agenda_items.title: 2025 City Council Calendar
agenda_items.description: Presentation of the calendar for the year 2025.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Debt Issuances
agenda_items.description: Discussion of upcoming agenda items related to debt issuances.

agenda_items.title: Cotton Bowl 2025 Scope of Work Contract Award
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the contract award for the Cotton Bowl 2025.

agenda_items.title: Monthly Budget Accountability Report
agenda_items.description: Report on the budget accountability for the month.

agenda_items.title: Technology Accountability Report
agenda_items.description: Report on technology accountability as of August 31, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Office of the City Auditor Monthly Internal Update on Internal Audit
agenda_items.description: Monthly update on internal audits released between August 17, 2024, and September 13, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Item - Authorizing a one-year Indefinite Delivery/Indefinite Quantity service price agreement for waste collection
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the service price agreement for waste collection and disposal.
